name: Amdocs Limited
description: Amdocs Limited is a leading provider of software and services to communications and media companies. Founded in 1982, Amdocs has built a reputation for delivering innovative solutions that empower organizations to enhance customer experiences, streamline operations, and drive digital transformation. The company specializes in customer experience systems, billing and operational support, and network solutions that are essential for the telecommunications industry. Amdocs serves major telecom operators around the globe, helping them to manage complex billing processes, improve customer engagement, and implement next-generation technologies such as cloud computing and artificial intelligence. Amdocs is committed to leveraging its extensive expertise to support clients in their digital transformation journeys, ensuring they remain competitive in a rapidly evolving market. Their solutions facilitate a seamless integration of digital services, enabling companies to deliver personalized experiences and drive revenue growth. With a strong focus on innovation and quality, Amdocs continues to be at the forefront of technological advancements in the telecommunications sector.

faq.answer: Amdocs is headquartered in Chesterfield, Missouri, USA.

faq.answer: Amdocs' main products include billing software, CRM solutions, and network optimization services.
